meaningMnemonic: At the <radical>gate</radical>, you <radical>kiss</radical> <kanji>the cabinet</kanji> members, one by one. In order to gain access to this government building, you have to kiss all the members of the cabinet at the gate. What a strange ritual.
readingMnemonic: You need to kiss each member of <kanji>the cabinet</kanji> to gain access to their building. And you need to get into the building to recover your <reading>cock</reading> (かく). Your prize winning cock has been captured by a member of the cabinet and you need to infiltrate their headquarters and recover your rooster!
